Summary: flying triangle zig zag across sky stoped over cemetaty stoped got out watched it hover very close scared left huge 70 ft triangle
divs: Sighting DetailsTeaveling south on 93 large set of lights movining eratically above the trees. At Burcham rd cemetary the craft was hovering abive the cemetary. We stopped at the church got out and looked at it it was probably a 70ft triangle hovering 90ft above the ground with lots of flashing lights and a hum buzzing sound to it. It was so close it scared us so we left.
